name: Rummel & Rabalder: I Snarkofagens Skugga
summary:
The game is a standalone sequel to the game Rummel & Rabalder: Dr. Frank's mask.

Unlike previous games in the series, this game had an adventure round in full 3D when you walked around in full 3D view and had missions. The obstacle courses were an active 3D rendering and if you crashed on an obstacle you automatically passed the obstacle. The game had no systematic varying crash scenes but showed a short and simple text when Rummel and Rabalder crashed. The game had a track where they rode on engines instead of sitting on a hammock. You should also, as usual, collect lifelines and "Cheetos-like" snacks for points.
